original_text:
I have dug wells in foreign lands
    and drunk the water there.
With the soles of my feet
    I have dried up all the streams of Egypt.”
korean_text: 내가 땅을 파서 이방의 물을 마셨고 나의 발바닥으로 애굽의 모든 강들을 말렸노라 하였도다

sentences.original_text: I have dug wells in foreign lands
With the soles of my feet
I have dried up all the streams of Egypt
